source.script:
#Total divided by closed + merged
$jsonFrag = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://squaredup-eng.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/search?jql=project = sq and fixversion in unreleasedversions() order by created asc&startAt=0&maxResults=100" -Headers $Headers
$totalBugs = $jsonFrag.total 
$jsonFrag = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://squaredup-eng.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/search?jql=project = sq AND fixversion in unreleasedversions() and status in (closed, merged)  order by created asc&startAt=0&maxResults=100" -Headers $Headers
$completedbugs = $jsonFrag.total 
$results = ($completedbugs/$totalbugs)*100
$results

contents.title: Bug fixes in the next release

source.script:
$pagination = 0
$dayAgo = 90
$createdShort = @()
$resolutionShort = @()

#count of bugs for the last period - this works regardless of how many bugs returned
$jsonFrag = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://squaredup-eng.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/search?jql=project = sq AND type = Bug and created > startofday(-$dayAgo) order by created asc&startAt=$pagination&maxResults=100" -Headers $Headers
$totalBugs = $jsonFrag.total

#Count each bug per date
$results = Do {
    $jsonFrag = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://squaredup-eng.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/search?jql=project = sq AND type = Bug and created > startofday(-$dayAgo) order by created asc&startAt=$pagination&maxResults=100" -Headers $Headers 
        
        #use only zero hh m s
        #Created is a list of dates, but how compare against each date?
        #$created = $jsonFrag.issues.fields.created | get-date -format d
        $created = $jsonFrag.issues.fields.created 
        foreach ($createdDate in $created) {
            $createdDate = Get-Date $createdDate -hour 00 -Minute 00 -Second 00 -Millisecond 000
            $createdShort += $createdDate
        }
        
        $resolution = $jsonFrag.issues.fields.resolutiondate
        foreach ($resolutionDate in $resolution) {
            if ($null -ne $resolutiondate) {
            $resolutionDate = Get-Date $resolutionDate -hour 00 -Minute 00 -Second 00 -Millisecond 000
            $resolutionShort += $resolutionDate
            }
        }
            
        #Build array for each date whether bug exists or not
        #1..$daysago | ForEach 
        For ($i=0; $i -le $dayAgo; $i++)
        {
            $date = (Get-Date -hour 00 -Minute 00 -Second 00 -Millisecond 000).AddDays(-$i)
                
            #Count each match of date to created date
            $createdCount = ($createdShort | where-object {$_ -eq $date}).count
            $resolvedCount = ($resolutionShort | where-object {$_ -eq $date}).count

            New-Object -TypeName PSObject -Property @{
                Date = $date
                createdcount = [int]$createdCount
                resolvedcount = [int]$resolvedCount

            }
        }
        
        #Build object
    $pagination += $pagination + 100
} While ($totalBugs -gt $pagination)
      
$results

        #use only zero hh m s

            $createdShort += $createdDate
        }
        
        $resolution = $jsonFrag.issues.fields.resolutiondate
        foreach ($resolutionDate in $resolution) {

            $resolutionDate = Get-Date $resolutionDate -hour 00 -Minute 00 -Second 00 -Millisecond 000
            $resolutionShort += $resolutionDate
            }
        }
            
        #Build array for each date whether bug exists or not
        #1..$daysago | ForEach

        {

                resolvedcount = [int]$resolvedCount

        }
        
        #Build object
    $pagination += $pagination + 100
} While ($totalBugs -gt $pagination)
      
$results

source.script:
## Bugs created per day
## Bugs resolved per day
## Bug total trendline - Total open bugs on StartofDay(-time frame eg 60days)
$dayAgo = 90
$pagination = 0
$createdShort = @()
$resolutionShort = @()

#count all open bugs
$jsonFrag = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://squaredup-eng.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/search?jql=project = sq AND type = Bug and status not in (closed, merged, rejected) order by created asc&startAt=$pagination&maxResults=100" -Headers $Headers
$trendcount = $jsonFrag.total

#count of bugs for the last period 
$jsonFrag = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://squaredup-eng.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/search?jql=project = sq AND type = Bug and created > startofday(-$dayAgo) order by created asc&startAt=$pagination&maxResults=100" -Headers $Headers
$totalBugs = $jsonFrag.total


#Count each bug per date
$results = Do {
    $jsonFrag = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://squaredup-eng.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/search?jql=project = sq AND type = Bug and created > startofday(-$dayAgo) order by created asc&startAt=$pagination&maxResults=100" -Headers $Headers 
        
        #use only zero hh m s
        #Created is a list of dates, but how compare against each date?
        #$created = $jsonFrag.issues.fields.created | get-date -format d
        $created = $jsonFrag.issues.fields.created 
        foreach ($createdDate in $created) {
            $createdDate = Get-Date $createdDate -hour 00 -Minute 00 -Second 00 -Millisecond 000
            $createdShort += $createdDate
        }
        
        $resolution = $jsonFrag.issues.fields.resolutiondate
        foreach ($resolutionDate in $resolution) {
            if ($null -ne $resolutiondate) {
            $resolutionDate = Get-Date $resolutionDate -hour 00 -Minute 00 -Second 00 -Millisecond 000
            $resolutionShort += $resolutionDate
            }
        }
            
        #Build array for each date whether bug exists or not
        #1..$daysago | ForEach 
        For ($i=0; $i -le $dayAgo; $i++)
        {
            $date = (Get-Date -hour 00 -Minute 00 -Second 00 -Millisecond 000).AddDays(-$i)
                
            #Count each match of date to created date
            $createdCount = ($createdShort | where-object {$_ -eq $date}).count
            $resolvedCount = ($resolutionShort | where-object {$_ -eq $date}).count
            $trendCount = $trendcount - $createdCount + $resolvedCount

            New-Object -TypeName PSObject -Property @{
                Date = $date
                #createdcount = [int]$createdCount
                #resolvedcount = [int]$resolvedCount
                trendcount = [int]$trendcount

            }
        }
        
        #Build object
    $pagination += $pagination + 100
} While ($totalBugs -gt $pagination)
      
$results
